name: anode production, prebake, for aluminium electrolysis | anode, prebake, for aluminium electrolysis | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/17896/documentation

Industry average of prebake anodes for use in the Hall-HÃ©roult process using prebake technology.;[This dataset is meant to replace the following datasets:]

The unit process begins with the unloading of process materials to the storage areas on site.  The operations associated with this unit process include:
* anode mix preparation, anode block forming and baking;
* rodding of baked anodes;
* maintenance and repair of plant and equipment; and 
* treatment of process air, liquids and solids.
The original data also accounts for recovery of spent anode materials (anode butts).  However, these are recycled in closed loop and are not explicitly accounted for in the inventory, although inputs and outputs of other flows are influenced by this recycling.
Treatment of scrubber sludges are excluded, as there is no corresponding waste treatment in the ecoinvent database.


The output of this process is rodded anodes to be transported to electrolysis plants employing prebake technology.
category: C:Manufacturing/27:Manufacture of electrical equipment/279:Manufacture of other electrical equipment/2790:Manufacture of other electrical equipment

processDocumentation.geographyDescription: Data mostly from global surveys by IAI.
processDocumentation.dataTreatmentDescription: The infrastructure input was not covered by the IAI survey and uses the rough guess in ecoinvent 2.2.
processDocumentation.samplingDescription: 2015 data is included where available from annual IAI surveys (electricity, fuel, petrol coke & pitch inputs). Other flows are based on a life cycle inventory survey carried out by IAI for its member and non member companies. The survey was conducted in 2016 for 2015 data.  No LCI data was reported from this region, hence weighted averages from global reported facilities are adopted.

exchanges.description:
Amount includes "Byproducts for external recycling", "Refractory material for external recycling", "Refractory (excluding SPL) sent to landfill" and "Other landfilled waste" in IAI report. If it becomes possible to specify byproducts and other landfilled waste, then these should be broken out of this total.  Currently, no recycling process exists in ecoinvent for refractory material, and hence these are modelled as sent to landfill.
